{"tiddlers":{"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released":{"text":"The plugin library for the latest and greatest plugins from [ext[t5a|https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io.git]]; most recent released versions of plugins by [ext[Andrew|http://t5a.github.io/#Andrew%20Harrison]].","url":"https://t5a.github.io/plugins","title":"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"Tiddlywiki Library for Plugins by Andrew Harrison"},"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/icon":{"text":"<svg class='tc-image-throb ic-image-button'height='24pt'width='24pt'viewBox='0 0 50 37'><path d='m5,8l20,-12l20,12v21l-20,12l-20,-12v-21z'/>{{$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/template}}</svg>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/license":{"text":"This is free and unencumbered software released into the public domain.

Anyone is free to copy, modify, publish, use, compile, sell, or distribute this software, either in source code form or as a compiled binary, for any purpose, commercial or non-commercial, and by any means.

For more information, please refer to <https://unlicense.org>","url":"https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/blob/master/LICENSE","type":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/license","tags":"$:/tags/License","license-type":"Unlicense"},"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/readme":{"text":"This plugin provides an analog clock with orbiting circles to tell the time. It uses SVG animateTranform elements to move.

This plugin comprises:

* Stylesheet
* Template","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/readme","tags":""},"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/stylesheet":{"text":".tc-throb {fill:transparent;position:relative;stroke-width:7;}.tc-throb-cir {stroke-width:5;stroke:#000;stroke-dasharray:1 25.8;transform:rotate(-0.5deg);transform-origin:center;}.tc-throb-s {stroke:url(#throb-s);stroke-dasharray:263;stroke-dashoffset:{{!!adjust-seconds}};}.tc-throb-m {stroke:url(#throb-m);stroke-dasharray:213;stroke-dashoffset:{{!!adjust-minutes}};}.tc-throb-h {stroke:url(#throb-h);stroke-dasharray:163;stroke-dashoffset:{{!!adjust-hours}};}.tc-image-throb {fill:#ff0;stroke:#c0f;stroke-width:2;}","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/stylesheet","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","seconds-tail-color":"#d00","seconds-head-color":"#f00","seconds-body-color":"#e00","minutes-tail-color":"#1c6","minutes-head-color":"#3c6","minutes-body-color":"#2c6","hours-tail-color":"#10f","hours-head-color":"#30f","hours-body-color":"#20f","defs":"<defs><linearGradient id='throb-s'><stop offset='50%'stop-color={{!!seconds-head-color}}stop-opacity='1'/><stop offset='65%'stop-color={{!!seconds-body-color}}stop-opacity='.5'/><stop offset='99%'stop-color={{!!seconds-tail-color}}stop-opacity='0'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='throb-m'><stop offset='50%'stop-color={{!!minutes-head-color}}stop-opacity='1'/><stop offset='65%'stop-color={{!!minutes-body-color}}stop-opacity='.5'/><stop offset='99%'stop-color={{!!minutes-tail-color}}stop-opacity='0'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='throb-h'><stop offset='50%'stop-color={{!!hours-head-color}}stop-opacity='1'/><stop offset='65%'stop-color={{!!hours-body-color}}stop-opacity='.5'/><stop offset='99%'stop-color={{!!hours-tail-color}}stop-opacity='0'/></linearGradient></defs>","caption":"Throb Clock","adjust-seconds":"-9","adjust-minutes":"2","adjust-hours":"12"},"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/template":{"text":"\define a()<svg class='tc-throb'viewBox='0 0 128 128'>{{$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/stylesheet!!defs}}<circle class='tc-throb-cir'cx='50%'cy='50%'r='40%'/><circle class='tc-throb-h'cx='50%'cy='50%'r='25%'><animateTransform attributeName='transform'type='rotate'values='$(h)$,64,64;$(h2)$,64,64'dur='43200s'repeatCount='indefinite'/></circle><circle class='tc-throb-m'cx='50%'cy='50%'r='35%'><animateTransform attributeName='transform'type='rotate'values='$(m)$,64,64;$(m2)$,64,64'dur='3600s'repeatCount='indefinite'/></circle><circle class='tc-throb-s'cx='50%'cy='50%'r='45%'><animateTransform attributeName='transform'type='rotate'values='$(s)$,64,64;$(s2)$,64,64'dur='60s'repeatCount='indefinite'/></circle></svg>
<$vars s1=<<now '0ss'>>m5=<<now '0mm'>>h5=<<now 'hh12'>>><$vars s={{{ [<s1>multiply[6]] }}}m3={{{ [<m5>multiply[6]] }}}m4={{{ [<s1>divide[10]] }}}h3={{{ [<h5>multiply[30]] }}}h4={{{ [<m5>divide[2]] }}}><$vars m={{{ [<m3>add<m4>] }}}h={{{ [<h3>add<h4>] }}}><$vars s2={{{ [<s>add[360]] }}}m2={{{ [<m>add[360]] }}}h2={{{ [<h>add[360]] }}}><<a>></$vars></$vars></$vars></$vars>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/template","tags":""}}}
title: $:/plugins/ajh/throbclock
